snippet.title: Remnant: From the Ashes | Nintendo Switch Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Humanity is struggling to survive, but they possess the technology... to play Remnant: From the Ashes wherever they want. Are you brave enough to grab your Switch and take back what's yours?

Remnant: From the Ashes is to Nintendo Switch on March 21st.

- Links & Info - 
Website: https://fromtheashes.remnantgame.com/

- Our Socials - 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/THQNordic 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/THQNordic 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thqnordic
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thqnordic 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic 

#Remnant #RemnantFromTheAshes
